description:
In this course I will take you step by step along the process of creating an animated promo for a project in a real world scenario for a client from scratch. If you are interested in learn how to create a professional, good looking and fluid animation for a promotional video for a client request or maybe your own portfolio, or even if you are planing to increase your animation skills based on a real life project then this course is for you!

This course will be detailed and it will cover lots of techniques to create the final piece.

I won't hide you nothing from the real work behind the whole process, you will see and understand the entire process to follow along!

We will begin from scratch to teach you how:

  1. Analize the provided script to create transitions from it
  2. Transform the script into sketches
  3. Thinking in transitions for the animation
  4. Set a color palette and how to use it inside AE
  5. Create a Common media folder to organize assets (ninja tip)
  6. Vectorize Assets using illustrator (not an illustrator course, but an overview)
  7. Prepare your assets for animations
  8. Importing and organizing assets into After Effects
  9. Using cinema 4D to create cartoon sketch style
  10. Integrating Cinema 4D with AE using Cineware to mix 3D and 2D
  11. Animating in sync with the voice over and more!
title: How to Make a Professional 2D Animation for a Promo Video
